text: Turkey Street railway station is in the Bullsmoor area of Enfield in the London Borough of Enfield, North London. The station is in Travelcard Zone 6 and is served by Lea Valley Lines services. The station is operated by London Overground as are all trains serving it. ==Gallery== Image:Turkey Street stn entrance canopy.JPG|Entrance canopy, on the southbound side Image:Turkey Street stn northbound.JPG|Platforms looking north Image:Turkey Street stn southbound.JPG|Platforms looking south Image:Turkey Street stn signage.JPG|Platform signage, July 2008 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:London Travelcard zone 6 Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Enfield Category:Railway stations opened in 1891 Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia
title: Turkey Street railway station
